sources.title: The Gentle Sex (1943)
sources.description: The stories of seven British girls who decide to help out during World War II. PD In UK At GATT Date. Not Eligible For GATT Never registered in the U.S. Mystic Nights Videos

metadata.Plot: During the War seven women from very different backgrounds find themselves together in the Auxiliary Territorial Services. They are soon drilling, driving lorries, and manning ack-ack batteries.
metadata.Writer: Moie Charles, Aim√©e Stuart, Doris Langley Moore
metadata.Actors: Joan Gates, Jean Gillie, Joan Greenwood
